item.title: How Bitship Simplifies Digital Sales on Square Online
item.description: In today’s digital age, e-commerce businesses are constantly seeking ways to improve the customer experience. If you’re using Square Online and selling digital goods, Bitship offers a seamless solution for automated digital file delivery. This article will guide you through the simple yet powerful features of Bitship that make digital sales hassle-free. The Concept of Product Mappings One of Bitship’s core features is the ability to create “Product Mappings.” These mappings allow you to connect a specific Item Variation in your Square Online store to a digital file URL.
